name: ClemsonSportsTalkNewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The latest audio updates from Lawton Swann and Clemson Sports Talk. You can listen to the full episodes of Clemson Sports Talk on your Amazon Echo by saying, "Alexa, play Clemson Sports Talk".

You can listen to the show live between 6-8PM weeknights by saying, "Alexa, play Fox Sports Radio 1400."

Follow the show on Twitter: @ClemsonSports

Go Tigers!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
